lines:
#loe Mare Hashim,ten te 
kiek nut toles of hiukfily 4h, og 
Dear Mr. Stearn

I have sent you 
a telegram for some money 
day before festerday

ill you kindly remi 
to me as soon as possible, 
yo bhinese Legation

your respectfully

ss Kuva
raw: #loe Mare Hashim,ten te kiek nut toles of hiukfily 4h, og Dear Mr. Stearn I have sent you a telegram for some money day before festerday ill you kindly remi to me as soon as possible, yo bhinese Legation your respectfully ss Kuva

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter stating that a telegram was sent to request that money be sent immediately c/o the Chinese Legation.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
